name: Super Procrastination Kart
description:
======= WARNING: EARLY BUILD, VEERRRRYYYY BUGGY =======

Super Procrastination Kart is a kart racer prototype with characters from a bunch of games I haven't finished! It's currently a very basic prototype, and lacks a lot of the features I'd like to add, but I welcome any and  all critique, input, and ideas to improve it.

This is an early EARLY version of the game. I'm starting a new job tomorrow so I'm going to take a break from the project for a few days, and fix the gross ol' bugs and stuff you'll probably experience in this current build. 

Next on my list are:
- ACTUALLY switching the characters
- Switching the physics to addforce (Good god I'm sorry about these collisions)
- Sound & Ambience!!
- Accommodate any feedback folks would like to add in the comments below

This is my first released project that I can call complete (to some extent lol), and I plan to add things like more maps, advanced and accurate drifting, and full racing functionality. For now, let me know what you think!

Thanks for having a look! Comments and Critique are welcomed and vastly appreciated!
